title: Effigy Mounds National Monument: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits and Reservations       Apply For A Special Use   Activities in the park that benefit an individual, group or organization, rather than the public at large require permits. A complete list of these activities are listed in the Superintendent's Compendium of Rules and Regulations (765KB PDF). Other commercial activities or soliciting business within the park require a commercial use authorization.    Download the application form (21.5KB PDF) and instructions for common special park uses. Return completed forms to the visitor center or mail them to Effigy Mounds NM, Special Park Uses Coordinator, 151 HWY 76, Harpers Ferry, IA 52146-7519.
